summary: Completed E2E testing for US-10 'Export Diagram' feature. All export functionality tests passed: SVG export, PNG export, filename using diagram title, success toast notifications, and export button visibility based on diagram state.
seed_data_creation: Used existing test diagram 'E2E Test Flowchart - UPDATED V2' (ID: 5bda84a2-9f65-4dcb-9bfb-7f470f737331)
context_for_next_testing_agent: US-10 Export Diagram feature is fully implemented and tested. Export button with data-testid='export-button' appears only when diagram is rendered. SVG and PNG export options work correctly with proper filenames based on diagram title. Success toast notifications appear after export.

US-10_Export_Diagram.export_button_visible_when_diagram_rende: PASS - Export button appears in preview panel when diagram is loaded
US-10_Export_Diagram.export_dropdown_shows_svg_png_options: PASS - Dropdown shows SVG (Vector) and PNG (Image) options with correct data-testid attributes
US-10_Export_Diagram.svg_export_downloads_correct_filename: PASS - Downloaded as 'e2e-test-flowchart-updated-v2.svg' (uses sanitized diagram title)
US-10_Export_Diagram.png_export_downloads_correct_filename: PASS - Downloaded as 'e2e-test-flowchart-updated-v2.png' (uses sanitized diagram title)
US-10_Export_Diagram.export_button_loading_state: PASS - Code verified: Loader2 icon with animate-spin shown during isExporting state
US-10_Export_Diagram.export_button_disabled_during_export: PASS - Code verified: disabled={isExporting} prevents multiple clicks
US-10_Export_Diagram.success_toast_after_download: PASS - Toast shows 'Exported as [filename]' after successful export
US-10_Export_Diagram.export_button_hidden_when_no_diagram: PASS - Export button not visible when no diagram is rendered (correct conditional rendering)

PreviewPanel.js.line_80: disabled={isExporting} - Button correctly disabled during export
PreviewPanel.js.lines_84-88: Loader2 with animate-spin shown when isExporting is true
PreviewPanel.js.lines_96_105: Dropdown menu items also disabled during export

DiagramRenderer.js.lines_211-222: getExportFilename() correctly sanitizes title for filename
DiagramRenderer.js.lines_225-301: handleExport() properly manages isExporting state with try/finally
DiagramRenderer.js.line_237-239: Prevents multiple clicks with isExporting check
